version_description:
v18.2
* UI bug fixes
* General improvements

v18.0
* New: Translation feature now available to story title/summary, user profiles, reviews, forum posts, and private messages. To activate translation, long click the text or look for the translate icon in the toolbar.

v17.0:
* New: Translations! Now you can translate each story chapter into variety of languages.
* General bug fixes and improvements

v11.6
* UI: smoother scrolling between multi-page screens
* Fixed CPU usage for users with over 1000 downloads
* General bug fixes and improvements

v11.16.1
* Fixed swiping/scrolling issue on some devices
* Fixed most recently used saved-search not moving to the top of list
* General bug fixes

v12:
* New: Text to Speech (TTS) feature for audio reading
* Redesigned login
* General improvements and bug fixes.

v12.0.1:
* New: Text to Speech (TTS) feature for audio reading
* Redesigned login
* General improvements and bug fixes.

v12.0.2:
* Fixed Chapter loading issue on some devices causing loading to never stop
* Fixed Text-to-Speech stopping background music.
* New: Allow Text-to-Speech to play when app is in background

v12:
* New: Text to Speech (TTS) feature for audio reading
* Redesigned login
* General improvements and bug fixes.

v12.0.3
* Improved TTS UI
* Allow TTS to speak over background music
* General bug fixes

v12.0.4:
* New: Revised A-Z prefix filter UI
* Improved TTS resource usage and UI
* Fixed TTS click to speak paragraph accuracy
* General bug fixes and improvements

v12.0.5:
* Fixed some delays in offline story syncing
* Fixed TTS compatibility with some stories
* General bug fixes

v12.0.6:
* UI polish
* Fixed Text-to-Speech issue on older iOS 10.X devices
* Fixed memory issue when accessing Document Manager
* General bug fixes and improvements

v12.0.7
* Fixed a pop-up window issue on some devices
* Fixed a memory issue when using QR code scanning feature

v12.5
* New: Text to Speech headphone control. If no background music is playing, you can use headphone button (both wired and wireless) to play or pause TTS feature. Feature is disabled when background music is active.
* UI: Lots of polish
* FIX: Resolved a lag/freeze issue that may affect some devices
* General bug fixes and improvements

v12.7
* New: User profile page now contains category filter for listing of published stories
* Fix: Resolved issue which caused some stories/chapter unable to utilize the Text to Speech (TTS) feature
* General bug fixes and improvements

v12.8
* Fixed: Review submission for stories may be applied to the wrong story chapter for some users
* UI Polish
* General bug fixes and improvements

v12.9
* Fixed: Some UI dialogs missing ok/confirm button
* General UI improvements and bug fixes

v13:
* New: Offline/Library Folder syncing across devices (all devices must have v13 or newer installed)
* New: Improved syncing of Offline/Library Stories
* General improvements and bug fixes

v13.0.1:
* Fixed restarting of failed offline story downloads
* Fixed batch downloading of 10+ stories may cause app to be unresponsive

v13:
* New: Offline/Library Folder syncing across devices (all devices must have v13 or newer installed)
* New: Improved syncing of Offline/Library Stories
* General improvements and bug fixes

v13.0.5:
* Resolved several iPhoneX UI compatibility issues

v13:
* New: Offline/Library Folder syncing across devices (all devices must have v13 or newer installed)
* New: Improved syncing of Offline/Library Stories
* General improvements and bug fixes

v13.0.7:
* Fixed unnecessary sync activity for some devices
* Resolved several iPhoneX UI compatibility issues

v13:
* New: Offline/Library Folder syncing across devices (all devices must have v13 or newer installed)
* New: Improved syncing of Offline/Library Stories
* General improvements and bug fixes

v13.5:
* New: Reading history syncing across multiple devices from the same account (devices must have v13.5 or higher installed)
* Improved: Story submission UI
* Improved: Lots of UI tweaks
* General bug fixes and improvements

v13.5.1
* General bug fixes

v13.5:
* New: Reading history syncing across multiple devices from the same account (devices must have v13.5 or higher installed)
* Improved: Story submission UI
* Improved: Lots of UI tweaks

v13.7
* New: Recently visited category history across multiple devices from the same account (devices must have v13.7 or higher installed)
* Improved: Reduced memory usage
* General improvements and bug fixes

v13.8
* Fixed ios 12 changed default TTS voice. Revert to female voice.
* Improved app security when communicating with server
* Fixed iOS XS phone displaying over-sized fonts
* General bug fixes and improvements

v13.8.1
* Tablet UI optimizations
* Fixed sync limit issue
* General bug fixes

v13.8
* Fixed ios 12 changed default TTS voice. Revert to female voice.
* Improved app security when communicating with server
* Fixed iOS XS phone displaying over-sized fonts
* General bug fixes and

v13.8.2
* Fixed crash in doc manager

v13.8.1
* Tablet UI optimizations
* Fixed sync limit issue
* General bug fixes
v13.8
* Fixed ios 12 changed default TTS voice. Revert to female voice.
* Improved app security when communicating with server
* Fixed iOS XS phone displaying over-sized fonts
* General bug fixes and

v13.9
* iPad UI optimizations
* General bug fixes

v13.10
* New: 3D touch shortchuts for the homescreen app icon
* Fixed potential crash on iOS 9 devices
* General bug fixes

v13.11
* Fixed issue where some users are not receiving registration/activation emails
* Fixed review scrolling causing unintended jumps to top

v14:
* New: merged story info/reading UI
* New: iPad/tablet UI
* Reduced cpu usage for devices with 3gb of ram or more
* General bug fixes and improvements

v14.1
* Fixed some devices not saving chapter/reading position
* UI: Added shortcuts to reading crossovers on home screen
* General bug fixes and improvements

v14.2
* Fix some corner cases where last read postion was not saved
* General bug fixes and improvements

v14.3
* Fixed library folder access
* General improvements and bug fixes

v14.5
* New: Merged beta profile UI with user profile
* New: Refreshed story info UI
* General bug fixes and improvements

v14.8
* Reduced app memory usage
* Faster syncing
* General bug fixes and improvements

v15.0
* Fixed auto-updating of library/offline stories
* New: more customizable reading fonts
* New: customizable app fonts
* New: editing of beta-reader profile

* New: Unread auto-updated offline stories will now be noted on home screen plus library listing page with red dot.
* Faster syncing
* General bug fixes

* Fixed issue where reading a story in folder removed story from folder
* Reduce UI lag when scrolling library stories
* General bug fixes

v15.6
* Fixed library sorting
* Eliminated UI lag for library with thousands of stories

v15.6.1:
* Fixed recent category/forum issues when empty
* General bug fixes

v16.0
*New: Bookmarks. Long press chapter content area to add a bookmark with reading position. Bookmarks are synced across devices.
* Fixed: Restoring story reading position from history may be inaccurate
* General bug fixes

v16.0.1
* Fixed critical bugs affecting sync and access
* General bug fixes

v16.0.2
* Fixed syncing issue on some devices
* Updated offline stories are now sorted to the top
* General bug fixes

v16.1:
* Fixed sync performance issues on some devices
* UI tweak for reading
* Lots of performance enhancements
* General bug fixes

v16.1.5
* General UI bug fixes and improvements

v16.2
* General bug fixes and improvements

* General bug fixes and improvements

* New: Translate will now also translate story and chapter title into target language.

This field is required. 3824
App Previews and Screenshots
Screenshots must be in the JPG or PNG format, and in the RGB color space. App previews must be in the M4V, MP4, or MOV format and can’t exceed 500 MB. Learn More
